name: Not A Knight
description:
Time to rise from nothing and become the knight you're meant to be!

Tackle four unique mini games that help you traverse your way through status in different cities:

⚔️ SNEAK PAST GUARDS - Use your cunning and sneak past enemy guards and escape dangerous territories

⚔️ SHOOT TARGETS - Master your archery and take aim to eliminate targets

⚔️ FORGE EQUIPMENT - Show off your skill in blacksmithing by creating weapons and armor

⚔️ GAIN RICHES - Impress the people and gather money to rise in popularity and fame

Have you got what it takes to reach the rank of Knight?

Disclaimer: This is a passion project and I may not be able to immediately adjust or change features. There is a feedback form at the end of the game if you’d like to send me information about what you think.

In case of problems please feel free to submit them to the google play link or via email:
dyelute@gmail.com
